23 template <typename T>
24 class Vector
25 {
26 public:
27  Vector();
28  Vector(const unsigned int n);
29  Vector(const T& a, const unsigned int n); //initialize to constant value
30  Vector(const T* a, const unsigned int n); // Initialize to array
31  Vector(const Vector &rhs); // copy constructor
32  ~Vector(); // destructor
33 
34  inline void set(const T* a, const unsigned int n);
35  Vector<T> extract(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes) const;
36  inline T& operator[](const unsigned int& i); //i-th element
37  inline const T& operator[](const unsigned int& i) const;
38 
39  inline unsigned int size() const;
40  inline void resize(const unsigned int n);
41  inline void resize(const T& a, const unsigned int n);
42 
43  Vector<T>& operator=(const Vector<T>& rhs); //assignment
44  Vector<T>& operator=(const T& a); //assign a to every element
45  inline Vector<T>& operator+=(const Vector<T>& rhs);
46  inline Vector<T>& operator-=(const Vector<T>& rhs);
47  inline Vector<T>& operator*=(const Vector<T>& rhs);
48  inline Vector<T>& operator/=(const Vector<T>& rhs);
49  inline Vector<T>& operator^=(const Vector<T>& rhs);
50  inline Vector<T>& operator+=(const T& a);
51  inline Vector<T>& operator-=(const T& a);
52  inline Vector<T>& operator*=(const T& a);
53  inline Vector<T>& operator/=(const T& a);
54  inline Vector<T>& operator^=(const T& a);
55 private:
56  unsigned int n; // size of array. upper index is n-1
57  T* v; // storage for data
58 };
59 
60 template <typename T>
61 Vector<T>::Vector()
62  : n(0), v(0)
63 {}
64 
65 template <typename T>
66 Vector<T>::Vector(const unsigned int n)
67  : v(new T[n])
68 {
69  this->n = n;
70 }
71 
72 template <typename T>
73 Vector<T>::Vector(const T& a, const unsigned int n)
74  : v(new T[n])
75 {
76  this->n = n;
77  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
78  v[i] = a;
79 }
80 
81 template <typename T>
82 Vector<T>::Vector(const T* a, const unsigned int n)
83  : v(new T[n])
84 {
85  this->n = n;
86  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
87  v[i] = *a++;
88 }
89 
90 template <typename T>
91 Vector<T>::Vector(const Vector<T>& rhs)
92  : v(new T[rhs.n])
93 {
94  this->n = rhs.n;
95  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
96  v[i] = rhs[i];
97 }
98 
99 template <typename T>
100 Vector<T>::~Vector()
101 {
102  if (v != 0)
103  delete[] (v);
104 }
105 
106 template <typename T>
107 void Vector<T>::resize(const unsigned int n)
108 {
109  if (n == this->n)
110  return;
111  if (v != 0)
112  delete[] (v);
113  v = new T[n];
114  this->n = n;
115 }
116 
117 template <typename T>
118 void Vector<T>::resize(const T& a, const unsigned int n)
119 {
120  resize(n);
121  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
122  v[i] = a;
123 }
124 
125 
126 template <typename T>
127 inline Vector<T>& Vector<T>::operator=(const Vector<T>& rhs)
128 // postcondition: normal assignment via copying has been performed;
129 // if vector and rhs were different sizes, vector
130 // has been resized to match the size of rhs
131 {
132  if (this != &rhs)
133  {
134  resize(rhs.n);
135  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
136  v[i] = rhs[i];
137  }
138  return *this;
139 }
140 
141 template <typename T>
142 inline Vector<T> & Vector<T>::operator=(const T& a) //assign a to every element
143 {
144  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
145  v[i] = a;
146  return *this;
147 }
148 
149 template <typename T>
150 inline T & Vector<T>::operator[](const unsigned int& i) //subscripting
151 {
152  return v[i];
153 }
154 
155 template <typename T>
156 inline const T& Vector<T>::operator[](const unsigned int& i) const //subscripting
157 {
158  return v[i];
159 }
160 
161 template <typename T>
162 inline unsigned int Vector<T>::size() const
163 {
164  return n;
165 }
166 
167 template <typename T>
168 inline void Vector<T>::set(const T* a, unsigned int n)
169 {
170  resize(n);
171  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
172  v[i] = a[i];
173 }
174 
175 template <typename T>
176 inline Vector<T> Vector<T>::extract(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes) const
177 {
178  Vector<T> tmp(indexes.size());
179  unsigned int i = 0;
180 
181  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator el = indexes.begin(); el != indexes.end(); el++)
182  {
183  if (*el >= n)
184  throw std::logic_error("Error extracting subvector: the indexes are out of vector bounds");
185  tmp[i++] = v[*el];
186  }
187 
188  return tmp;
189 }
190 
191 template <typename T>
192 inline Vector<T>& Vector<T>::operator+=(const Vector<T>& rhs)
193 {
194  if (this->size() != rhs.size())
195  throw std::logic_error("Operator+=: vectors have different sizes");
196  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
197  v[i] += rhs[i];
198 
199  return *this;
200 }
201 
202 
203 template <typename T>
204 inline Vector<T>& Vector<T>::operator+=(const T& a)
205 {
206  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
207  v[i] += a;
208 
209  return *this;
210 }

213 inline Vector<T> operator+(const Vector<T>& rhs)
214 {
215  return rhs;

218 template <typename T>
219 inline Vector<T> operator+(const Vector<T>& lhs, const Vector<T>& rhs)
220 {
221  if (lhs.size() != rhs.size())
222  throw std::logic_error("Operator+: vectors have different sizes");
223  Vector<T> tmp(lhs.size());
224  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lhs.size(); i++)
225  tmp[i] = lhs[i] + rhs[i];
226 
227  return tmp;
228 }

273 {
274  return (T)(-1) * rhs;

416 inline Vector<T> operator^(const Vector<T>& lhs, const Vector<T>& rhs)
417 {

419  throw std::logic_error("Operator^: vectors have different sizes");
420  Vector<T> tmp(lhs.size());

424  return tmp;

467 template <typename T>
468 inline bool operator==(const Vector<T>& v, const Vector<T>& w)
469 {
470  if (v.size() != w.size())
471  throw std::logic_error("Vectors of different size are not confrontable");
472  for (unsigned i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)
473  if (v[i] != w[i])
474  return false;
475  return true;
476 }
477 
478 template <typename T>
479 inline bool operator!=(const Vector<T>& v, const Vector<T>& w)
480 {
481  if (v.size() != w.size())
482  throw std::logic_error("Vectors of different size are not confrontable");
483  for (unsigned i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)
484  if (v[i] != w[i])
485  return true;
486  return false;
487 }
488

496  return false;
497  return true;

536 template <typename T>
537 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Vector<T>& v)
538 {
539  os << std::endl << v.size() << std::endl;
540  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size() - 1; i++)
541  os << std::setw(20) << std::setprecision(16) << v[i] << ", ";
542  os << std::setw(20) << std::setprecision(16) << v[v.size() - 1] << std::endl;
543 
544  return os;
545 }

547 template <typename T>
548 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, Vector<T>& v)
549 {
550  int elements;
551  char comma;
552  is >> elements;
553  v.resize(elements);
554  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < elements; i++)
555  is >> v[i] >> comma;
556 
557  return is;
558 }

568 template <typename T>
569 class CanonicalBaseVector : public Vector<T>
570 {
571 public:
572  CanonicalBaseVector(unsigned int i, unsigned int n);
573  inline void reset(unsigned int i);
574 private:
575  unsigned int e;
576 };
577 
578 template <typename T>
579 CanonicalBaseVector<T>::CanonicalBaseVector(unsigned int i, unsigned int n)
580  : Vector<T>((T)0, n), e(i)
581 { (*this)[e] = (T)1; }
582 
583 template <typename T>
584 inline void CanonicalBaseVector<T>::reset(unsigned int i)
585 {
586  (*this)[e] = (T)0;
587  e = i;
588  (*this)[e] = (T)1;
589 }

593 template <typename T>
594 inline T sum(const Vector<T>& v)
595 {
596  T tmp = (T)0;
597  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)
598  tmp += v[i];
599 
600  return tmp;
601 }

603 template <typename T>
604 inline T prod(const Vector<T>& v)
605 {
606  T tmp = (T)1;
607  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)
608  tmp *= v[i];
609 
610  return tmp;
611 }

613 template <typename T>
614 inline T mean(const Vector<T>& v)
615 {
616  T sum = (T)0;
617  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)
618  sum += v[i];
619  return sum / v.size();
620 }
621 
622 template <typename T>
623 inline T median(const Vector<T>& v)
624 {
625  Vector<T> tmp = sort(v);
626  if (v.size() % 2 == 1) // it is an odd-sized vector
627  return tmp[v.size() / 2];
628  else
629  return 0.5 * (tmp[v.size() / 2 - 1] + tmp[v.size() / 2]);
630 }
631 
632 template <typename T>
633 inline T stdev(const Vector<T>& v, bool sample_correction = false)
634 {
635  return sqrt(var(v, sample_correction));
636 }
637 
638 template <typename T>
639 inline T var(const Vector<T>& v, bool sample_correction = false)
640 {
641  T sum = (T)0, ssum = (T)0;
642  unsigned int n = v.size();
643  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
644  {
645  sum += v[i];
646  ssum += (v[i] * v[i]);
647  }
648  if (!sample_correction)
649  return (ssum / n) - (sum / n) * (sum / n);
650  else
651  return n * ((ssum / n) - (sum / n) * (sum / n)) / (n - 1);
652 }
653 
654 template <typename T>
655 inline T max(const Vector<T>& v)
656 {
657  T value = v[0];
658  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < v.size(); i++)
659  value = std::max(v[i], value);
660 
661  return value;
662 }
663 
664 template <typename T>
665 inline T min(const Vector<T>& v)
666 {
667  T value = v[0];
668  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < v.size(); i++)
669  value = std::min(v[i], value);
670 
671  return value;
672 }

674 template <typename T>
675 inline unsigned int index_max(const Vector<T>& v)
676 {
677  unsigned int max = 0;
678  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < v.size(); i++)
679  if (v[i] > v[max])
680  max = i;
681 
682  return max;
683 }

690  if (v[i] < v[min])
691  min = i;
692 
693  return min;
694 }

697 template <typename T>
698 inline T dot_prod(const Vector<T>& a, const Vector<T>& b)
699 {
700  T sum = (T)0;
701  if (a.size() != b.size())
702  throw std::logic_error("Dotprod error: the vectors are not the same size");
703  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++)
704  sum += a[i] * b[i];
705 
706  return sum;
707 }

715 {

718  tmp[i] = exp(v[i]);

763 template <typename T>
764 inline Vector<T> sign(const Vector<T>& v)
765 {
766  Vector<T> tmp(v.size());
767  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)
768  tmp[i] = v[i] > 0 ? +1 : v[i] == 0 ? 0 : -1;
769 
770  return tmp;
771 }
772 
773 template <typename T>
774 inline unsigned int partition(Vector<T>& v, unsigned int begin, unsigned int end)
775 {
776  unsigned int i = begin + 1, j = begin + 1;
777  T pivot = v[begin];
778  while (j <= end)
779  {
780  if (v[j] < pivot) {
781  std::swap(v[i], v[j]);
782  i++;
783  }
784  j++;
785  }
786  v[begin] = v[i - 1];
787  v[i - 1] = pivot;
788  return i - 2;
789 }
790 
791 
792 template <typename T>
793 inline void quicksort(Vector<T>& v, unsigned int begin, unsigned int end)
794 {
795  if (end > begin)
796  {
797  unsigned int index = partition(v, begin, end);
798  quicksort(v, begin, index);
799  quicksort(v, index + 2, end);
800  }
801 }
802 
803 template <typename T>
804 inline Vector<T> sort(const Vector<T>& v)
805 {
806  Vector<T> tmp(v);
807 
808  quicksort<T>(tmp, 0, tmp.size() - 1);
809 
810  return tmp;
811 }
812 
813 template <typename T>
814 inline Vector<double> rank(const Vector<T>& v)
815 {
816  Vector<T> tmp(v);
817  Vector<double> tmp_rank(0.0, v.size());
818 
819  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < tmp.size(); i++)
820  {
821  unsigned int smaller = 0, equal = 0;
822  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < tmp.size(); j++)
823  if (i == j)
824  continue;
825  else
826  if (tmp[j] < tmp[i])
827  smaller++;
828  else if (tmp[j] == tmp[i])
829  equal++;
830  tmp_rank[i] = smaller + 1;
831  if (equal > 0)
832  {
833  for (unsigned int j = 1; j <= equal; j++)
834  tmp_rank[i] += smaller + 1 + j;
835  tmp_rank[i] /= (double)(equal + 1);
836  }
837  }
838 
839  return tmp_rank;
840 }
841 
842 //enum MType { DIAG };
843 
844 template <typename T>
845 class Matrix
846 {
847 public:
848  Matrix(); // Default constructor
849  Matrix(const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m); // Construct a n x m matrix
850  Matrix(const T& a, const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m); // Initialize the content to constant a
851  Matrix(MType t, const T& a, const T& o, const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m);
852  Matrix(MType t, const Vector<T>& v, const T& o, const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m);
853  Matrix(const T* a, const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m); // Initialize to array
854  Matrix(const Matrix<T>& rhs); // Copy constructor
855  ~Matrix(); // destructor
856 
857  inline T* operator[](const unsigned int& i) { return v[i]; } // Subscripting: row i
858  inline const T* operator[](const unsigned int& i) const { return v[i]; }; // const subsctipting
859 
860  inline void resize(const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m);
861  inline void resize(const T& a, const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m);
862 
863 
864  inline Vector<T> extractRow(const unsigned int i) const;
865  inline Vector<T> extractColumn(const unsigned int j) const;
866  inline Vector<T> extractDiag() const;
867  inline Matrix<T> extractRows(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes) const;
868  inline Matrix<T> extractColumns(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes) const;
869  inline Matrix<T> extract(const std::set<unsigned int>& r_indexes, const std::set<unsigned int>& c_indexes) const;
870 
871  inline void set(const T* a, unsigned int n, unsigned int m);
872  inline void set(const std::set<unsigned int>& r_indexes, const std::set<unsigned int>& c_indexes, const Matrix<T>& m);
873  inline void setRow(const unsigned int index, const Vector<T>& v);
874  inline void setRow(const unsigned int index, const Matrix<T>& v);
875  inline void setRows(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes, const Matrix<T>& m);
876  inline void setColumn(const unsigned int index, const Vector<T>& v);
877  inline void setColumn(const unsigned int index, const Matrix<T>& v);
878  inline void setColumns(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes, const Matrix<T>& m);
879 
880 
881  inline unsigned int nrows() const { return n; } // number of rows
882  inline unsigned int ncols() const { return m; } // number of columns
883 
884  inline Matrix<T>& operator=(const Matrix<T>& rhs); // Assignment operator
885  inline Matrix<T>& operator=(const T& a); // Assign to every element value a
886  inline Matrix<T>& operator+=(const Matrix<T>& rhs);
887  inline Matrix<T>& operator-=(const Matrix<T>& rhs);
888  inline Matrix<T>& operator*=(const Matrix<T>& rhs);
889  inline Matrix<T>& operator/=(const Matrix<T>& rhs);
890  inline Matrix<T>& operator^=(const Matrix<T>& rhs);
891  inline Matrix<T>& operator+=(const T& a);
892  inline Matrix<T>& operator-=(const T& a);
893  inline Matrix<T>& operator*=(const T& a);
894  inline Matrix<T>& operator/=(const T& a);
895  inline Matrix<T>& operator^=(const T& a);
896  inline operator Vector<T>();
897 private:
898  unsigned int n; // number of rows
899  unsigned int m; // number of columns
900  T **v; // storage for data
901 };
902 
903 template <typename T>
904 Matrix<T>::Matrix()
905  : n(0), m(0), v(0)
906 {}
907 
908 template <typename T>
909 Matrix<T>::Matrix(unsigned int n, unsigned int m)
910  : v(new T*[n])
911 {
912  this->n = n; this->m = m;
913  v[0] = new T[m * n];
914  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++)
915  v[i] = v[i - 1] + m;
916 }
917 
918 template <typename T>
919 Matrix<T>::Matrix(const T& a, unsigned int n, unsigned int m)
920  : v(new T*[n])
921 {
922  this->n = n; this->m = m;
923  v[0] = new T[m * n];
924  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++)
925  v[i] = v[i - 1] + m;
926  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
927  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
928  v[i][j] = a;
929 }
930 
931 template <class T>
932 Matrix<T>::Matrix(const T* a, unsigned int n, unsigned int m)
933  : v(new T*[n])
934 {
935  this->n = n; this->m = m;
936  v[0] = new T[m * n];
937  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++)
938  v[i] = v[i - 1] + m;
939  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
940  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
941  v[i][j] = *a++;
942 }
943 
944 template <class T>
945 Matrix<T>::Matrix(MType t, const T& a, const T& o, unsigned int n, unsigned int m)
946  : v(new T*[n])
947 {
948  this->n = n; this->m = m;
949  v[0] = new T[m * n];
950  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++)
951  v[i] = v[i - 1] + m;
952  switch (t)
953  {
954  case DIAG:
955  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
956  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
957  if (i != j)
958  v[i][j] = o;
959  else
960  v[i][j] = a;
961  break;
962  default:
963  throw std::logic_error("Matrix type not supported");
964  }
965 }
966 
967 template <class T>
968 Matrix<T>::Matrix(MType t, const Vector<T>& a, const T& o, unsigned int n, unsigned int m)
969  : v(new T*[n])
970 {
971  this->n = n; this->m = m;
972  v[0] = new T[m * n];
973  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++)
974  v[i] = v[i - 1] + m;
975  switch (t)
976  {
977  case DIAG:
978  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
979  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
980  if (i != j)
981  v[i][j] = o;
982  else
983  v[i][j] = a[i];
984  break;
985  default:
986  throw std::logic_error("Matrix type not supported");
987  }
988 }
989 
990 template <typename T>
991 Matrix<T>::Matrix(const Matrix<T>& rhs)
992  : v(new T*[rhs.n])
993 {
994  n = rhs.n; m = rhs.m;
995  v[0] = new T[m * n];
996  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++)
997  v[i] = v[i - 1] + m;
998  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
999  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1000  v[i][j] = rhs[i][j];
1001 }
1002 
1003 template <typename T>
1004 Matrix<T>::~Matrix()
1005 {
1006  if (v != 0) {
1007  delete[] (v[0]);
1008  delete[] (v);
1009  }
1010 }
1011 
1012 template <typename T>
1013 inline Matrix<T>& Matrix<T>::operator=(const Matrix<T> &rhs)
1014 // postcondition: normal assignment via copying has been performed;
1015 // if matrix and rhs were different sizes, matrix
1016 // has been resized to match the size of rhs
1017 {
1018  if (this != &rhs)
1019  {
1020  resize(rhs.n, rhs.m);
1021  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1022  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1023  v[i][j] = rhs[i][j];
1024  }
1025  return *this;
1026 }
1027 
1028 template <typename T>
1029 inline Matrix<T>& Matrix<T>::operator=(const T& a) // assign a to every element
1030 {
1031  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1032  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1033  v[i][j] = a;
1034  return *this;
1035 }
1036 
1037 
1038 template <typename T>
1039 inline void Matrix<T>::resize(const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m)
1040 {
1041  if (n == this->n && m == this->m)
1042  return;
1043  if (v != 0)
1044  {
1045  delete[] (v[0]);
1046  delete[] (v);
1047  }
1048  this->n = n; this->m = m;
1049  v = new T*[n];
1050  v[0] = new T[m * n];
1051  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++)
1052  v[i] = v[i - 1] + m;
1053 }
1054 
1055 template <typename T>
1056 inline void Matrix<T>::resize(const T& a, const unsigned int n, const unsigned int m)
1057 {
1058  resize(n, m);
1059  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1060  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1061  v[i][j] = a;
1062 }
1063 
1064 
1065 
1066 template <typename T>
1067 inline Vector<T> Matrix<T>::extractRow(const unsigned int i) const
1068 {
1069  if (i >= n)
1070  throw std::logic_error("Error in extractRow: trying to extract a row out of matrix bounds");
1071  Vector<T> tmp(v[i], m);
1072 
1073  return tmp;
1074 }
1075 
1076 template <typename T>
1077 inline Vector<T> Matrix<T>::extractColumn(const unsigned int j) const
1078 {
1079  if (j >= m)
1080  throw std::logic_error("Error in extractRow: trying to extract a row out of matrix bounds");
1081  Vector<T> tmp(n);
1082 
1083  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1084  tmp[i] = v[i][j];
1085 
1086  return tmp;
1087 }
1088 
1089 template <typename T>
1090 inline Vector<T> Matrix<T>::extractDiag() const
1091 {
1092  unsigned int d = std::min(n, m);
1093 
1094  Vector<T> tmp(d);
1095 
1096  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < d; i++)
1097  tmp[i] = v[i][i];
1098 
1099  return tmp;
1100 
1101 }
1102 
1103 template <typename T>
1104 inline Matrix<T> Matrix<T>::extractRows(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes) const
1105 {
1106  Matrix<T> tmp(indexes.size(), m);
1107  unsigned int i = 0;
1108 
1109  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator el = indexes.begin(); el != indexes.end(); el++)
1110  {
1111  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1112  {
1113  if (*el >= n)
1114  throw std::logic_error("Error extracting rows: the indexes are out of matrix bounds");
1115  tmp[i][j] = v[*el][j];
1116  }
1117  i++;
1118  }
1119 
1120  return tmp;
1121 }
1122 
1123 template <typename T>
1124 inline Matrix<T> Matrix<T>::extractColumns(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes) const
1125 {
1126  Matrix<T> tmp(n, indexes.size());
1127  unsigned int j = 0;
1128 
1129  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator el = indexes.begin(); el != indexes.end(); el++)
1130  {
1131  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1132  {
1133  if (*el >= m)
1134  throw std::logic_error("Error extracting columns: the indexes are out of matrix bounds");
1135  tmp[i][j] = v[i][*el];
1136  }
1137  j++;
1138  }
1139 
1140  return tmp;
1141 }
1142 
1143 template <typename T>
1144 inline Matrix<T> Matrix<T>::extract(const std::set<unsigned int>& r_indexes, const std::set<unsigned int>& c_indexes) const
1145 {
1146  Matrix<T> tmp(r_indexes.size(), c_indexes.size());
1147  unsigned int i = 0, j;
1148 
1149  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator r_el = r_indexes.begin(); r_el != r_indexes.end(); r_el++)
1150  {
1151  if (*r_el >= n)
1152  throw std::logic_error("Error extracting submatrix: the indexes are out of matrix bounds");
1153  j = 0;
1154  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator c_el = c_indexes.begin(); c_el != c_indexes.end(); c_el++)
1155  {
1156  if (*c_el >= m)
1157  throw std::logic_error("Error extracting rows: the indexes are out of matrix bounds");
1158  tmp[i][j] = v[*r_el][*c_el];
1159  j++;
1160  }
1161  i++;
1162  }
1163 
1164  return tmp;
1165 }
1166 
1167 template <typename T>
1168 inline void Matrix<T>::setRow(unsigned int i, const Vector<T>& a)
1169 {
1170  if (i >= n)
1171  throw std::logic_error("Error in setRow: trying to set a row out of matrix bounds");
1172  if (this->m != a.size())
1173  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix row: ranges are not compatible");
1174  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < ncols(); j++)
1175  v[i][j] = a[j];
1176 }
1177 
1178 template <typename T>
1179 inline void Matrix<T>::setRow(unsigned int i, const Matrix<T>& a)
1180 {
1181  if (i >= n)
1182  throw std::logic_error("Error in setRow: trying to set a row out of matrix bounds");
1183  if (this->m != a.ncols())
1184  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix column: ranges are not compatible");
1185  if (a.nrows() != 1)
1186  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix column with a non-row matrix");
1187  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < ncols(); j++)
1188  v[i][j] = a[0][j];
1189 }
1190 
1191 template <typename T>
1192 inline void Matrix<T>::setRows(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes, const Matrix<T>& m)
1193 {
1194  unsigned int i = 0;
1195 
1196  if (indexes.size() != m.nrows() || this->m != m.ncols())
1197  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix rows: ranges are not compatible");
1198  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator el = indexes.begin(); el != indexes.end(); el++)
1199  {
1200  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < ncols(); j++)
1201  {
1202  if (*el >= n)
1203  throw std::logic_error("Error in setRows: trying to set a row out of matrix bounds");
1204  v[*el][j] = m[i][j];
1205  }
1206  i++;
1207  }
1208 }
1209 
1210 template <typename T>
1211 inline void Matrix<T>::setColumn(unsigned int j, const Vector<T>& a)
1212 {
1213  if (j >= m)
1214  throw std::logic_error("Error in setColumn: trying to set a column out of matrix bounds");
1215  if (this->n != a.size())
1216  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix column: ranges are not compatible");
1217  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nrows(); i++)
1218  v[i][j] = a[i];
1219 }
1220 
1221 template <typename T>
1222 inline void Matrix<T>::setColumn(unsigned int j, const Matrix<T>& a)
1223 {
1224  if (j >= m)
1225  throw std::logic_error("Error in setColumn: trying to set a column out of matrix bounds");
1226  if (this->n != a.nrows())
1227  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix column: ranges are not compatible");
1228  if (a.ncols() != 1)
1229  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix column with a non-column matrix");
1230  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nrows(); i++)
1231  v[i][j] = a[i][0];
1232 }
1233 
1234 
1235 template <typename T>
1236 inline void Matrix<T>::setColumns(const std::set<unsigned int>& indexes, const Matrix<T>& a)
1237 {
1238  unsigned int j = 0;
1239 
1240  if (indexes.size() != a.ncols() || this->n != a.nrows())
1241  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix columns: ranges are not compatible");
1242  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator el = indexes.begin(); el != indexes.end(); el++)
1243  {
1244  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nrows(); i++)
1245  {
1246  if (*el >= m)
1247  throw std::logic_error("Error in setColumns: trying to set a column out of matrix bounds");
1248  v[i][*el] = a[i][j];
1249  }
1250  j++;
1251  }
1252 }
1253 
1254 template <typename T>
1255 inline void Matrix<T>::set(const std::set<unsigned int>& r_indexes, const std::set<unsigned int>& c_indexes, const Matrix<T>& a)
1256 {
1257  unsigned int i = 0, j;
1258  if (c_indexes.size() != a.ncols() || r_indexes.size() != a.nrows())
1259  throw std::logic_error("Error setting matrix elements: ranges are not compatible");
1260 
1261  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator r_el = r_indexes.begin(); r_el != r_indexes.end(); r_el++)
1262  {
1263  if (*r_el >= n)
1264  throw std::logic_error("Error in set: trying to set a row out of matrix bounds");
1265  j = 0;
1266  for (std::set<unsigned int>::const_iterator c_el = c_indexes.begin(); c_el != c_indexes.end(); c_el++)
1267  {
1268  if (*c_el >= m)
1269  throw std::logic_error("Error in set: trying to set a column out of matrix bounds");
1270  v[*r_el][*c_el] = a[i][j];
1271  j++;
1272  }
1273  i++;
1274  }
1275 }
1276 
1277 template <typename T>
1278 inline void Matrix<T>::set(const T* a, unsigned int n, unsigned int m)
1279 {
1280  if (this->n != n || this->m != m)
1281  resize(n, m);
1282  unsigned int k = 0;
1283  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1284  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1285  v[i][j] = a[k++];
1286 }

1289 template <typename T>
1290 Matrix<T> operator+(const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1291 {
1292  return rhs;
1293 }
1294 
1295 template <typename T>
1296 Matrix<T> operator+(const Matrix<T>& lhs, const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1297 {
1298  if (lhs.ncols() != rhs.ncols() || lhs.nrows() != rhs.nrows())
1299  throw std::logic_error("Operator+: matrices have different sizes");
1300  Matrix<T> tmp(lhs.nrows(), lhs.ncols());
1301  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lhs.nrows(); i++)
1302  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < lhs.ncols(); j++)
1303  tmp[i][j] = lhs[i][j] + rhs[i][j];
1304 
1305  return tmp;
1306 }
1307 
1308 template <typename T>
1309 Matrix<T> operator+(const Matrix<T>& lhs, const T& a)
1310 {
1311  Matrix<T> tmp(lhs.nrows(), lhs.ncols());
1312  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lhs.nrows(); i++)
1313  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < lhs.ncols(); j++)
1314  tmp[i][j] = lhs[i][j] + a;
1315 
1316  return tmp;
1317 }
1318 
1319 template <typename T>
1320 Matrix<T> operator+(const T& a, const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1321 {
1322  Matrix<T> tmp(rhs.nrows(), rhs.ncols());
1323  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rhs.nrows(); i++)
1324  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < rhs.ncols(); j++)
1325  tmp[i][j] = a + rhs[i][j];
1326 
1327  return tmp;
1328 }
1329 
1330 template <typename T>
1331 inline Matrix<T>& Matrix<T>::operator+=(const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1332 {
1333  if (m != rhs.ncols() || n != rhs.nrows())
1334  throw std::logic_error("Operator+=: matrices have different sizes");
1335  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1336  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1337  v[i][j] += rhs[i][j];
1338 
1339  return *this;
1340 }
1341 
1342 template <typename T>
1343 inline Matrix<T>& Matrix<T>::operator+=(const T& a)
1344 {
1345  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1346  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1347  v[i][j] += a;
1348 
1349  return *this;
1350 }

1352 template <typename T>
1353 Matrix<T> operator-(const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1354 {
1355  return (T)(-1) * rhs;
1356 }
1357 
1358 template <typename T>
1359 Matrix<T> operator-(const Matrix<T>& lhs, const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1360 {
1361  if (lhs.ncols() != rhs.ncols() || lhs.nrows() != rhs.nrows())
1362  throw std::logic_error("Operator-: matrices have different sizes");
1363  Matrix<T> tmp(lhs.nrows(), lhs.ncols());
1364  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lhs.nrows(); i++)
1365  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < lhs.ncols(); j++)
1366  tmp[i][j] = lhs[i][j] - rhs[i][j];
1367 
1368  return tmp;
1369 }
1370 
1371 template <typename T>
1372 Matrix<T> operator-(const Matrix<T>& lhs, const T& a)
1373 {
1374  Matrix<T> tmp(lhs.nrows(), lhs.ncols());
1375  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lhs.nrows(); i++)
1376  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < lhs.ncols(); j++)
1377  tmp[i][j] = lhs[i][j] - a;
1378 
1379  return tmp;
1380 }
1381 
1382 template <typename T>
1383 Matrix<T> operator-(const T& a, const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1384 {
1385  Matrix<T> tmp(rhs.nrows(), rhs.ncols());
1386  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rhs.nrows(); i++)
1387  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < rhs.ncols(); j++)
1388  tmp[i][j] = a - rhs[i][j];
1389 
1390  return tmp;
1391 }
1392 
1393 template <typename T>
1394 inline Matrix<T>& Matrix<T>::operator-=(const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1395 {
1396  if (m != rhs.ncols() || n != rhs.nrows())
1397  throw std::logic_error("Operator-=: matrices have different sizes");
1398  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1399  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1400  v[i][j] -= rhs[i][j];
1401 
1402  return *this;
1403 }
1404

1407 {
1408  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1409  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1410  v[i][j] -= a;
1411 
1412  return *this;
1413 }

1432  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lhs.nrows(); i++)
1433  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < lhs.ncols(); j++)
1434  tmp[i][j] = lhs[i][j] * a;

1443  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rhs.nrows(); i++)
1444  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < rhs.ncols(); j++)
1445  tmp[i][j] = a * rhs[i][j];

1450 // custom matrix transpose
1451 template <typename T>
1452 Matrix<T> transpose(const Matrix<T>& m)
1453 {
1454  Matrix<T> tmp;
1455  tmp.resize(m.ncols(), m.nrows());
1456  for (unsigned int row = 0; row < m.nrows(); row++)
1457  for (unsigned int col = 0; col < m.ncols(); col++)
1458  tmp[col][row] = m[row][col];
1459 
1460  return tmp;
1461 }
1462 
1463 // custom matrix multiplication
1464 template <typename T>
1465 Matrix<T> operator*(const Matrix<T>& lhs, const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1466 {
1467  if (lhs.ncols() != rhs.nrows())
1468  throw std::logic_error("Operator*: matrices have wrong dimensions");
1469  Matrix<T> tmp;
1470  tmp.resize(0, lhs.nrows(), rhs.ncols());
1471  for (unsigned int rowLHS = 0; rowLHS < lhs.nrows(); rowLHS++)
1472  for (unsigned int colRHS = 0; colRHS < rhs.ncols(); colRHS++)
1473  for (unsigned int colLHS = 0; colLHS < lhs.ncols(); colLHS++)
1474  tmp[rowLHS][colRHS] += lhs[rowLHS][colLHS] * rhs[colLHS][colRHS];
1475 
1476  return tmp;
1477 }
1478

1483  throw std::logic_error("Operator*=: matrices have different sizes");
1484  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
1485  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)
1486  v[i][j] *= rhs[i][j];
1487 
1488  return *this;
1489 }

1495  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m; j++)

1501 template <typename T>
1502 Matrix<T> operator/(const Matrix<T>& lhs, const Matrix<T>& rhs)
1503 {

1505  throw std::logic_error("Operator+: matrices have different sizes");
1506  Matrix<T> tmp(lhs.nrows(), lhs.ncols());
1507  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lhs.nrows(); i++)
1508  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < lhs.ncols(); j++)
1509  tmp[i][j] = lhs[i][j] / rhs[i][j];
1510 
1511  return tmp;
1512 }

1592 template <typename T>
1593 inline Matrix<T>::operator Vector<T>()
1594 {
1595  if (n > 1 && m > 1)
1596  throw std::logic_error("Error matrix cast to vector: trying to cast a multi-dimensional matrix");
1597  if (n == 1)
1598  return extractRow(0);
1599  else
1600  return extractColumn(0);
1601 }

1603 template <typename T>
1604 inline bool operator==(const Matrix<T>& a, const Matrix<T>& b)
1605 {
1606  if (a.nrows() != b.nrows() || a.ncols() != b.ncols())
1607  throw std::logic_error("Matrices of different size are not confrontable");
1608  for (unsigned i = 0; i < a.nrows(); i++)
1609  for (unsigned j = 0; j < a.ncols(); j++)
1610  if (a[i][j] != b[i][j])
1611  return false;
1612  return true;
1613 }
1614 
1615 template <typename T>
1616 inline bool operator!=(const Matrix<T>& a, const Matrix<T>& b)
1617 {
1618  if (a.nrows() != b.nrows() || a.ncols() != b.ncols())
1619  throw std::logic_error("Matrices of different size are not confrontable");
1620  for (unsigned i = 0; i < a.nrows(); i++)
1621  for (unsigned j = 0; j < a.ncols(); j++)
1622  if (a[i][j] != b[i][j])
1623  return true;
1624  return false;
1625 }

1633 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Matrix<T>& m)
1634 {

1636  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m.nrows(); i++)
1637  {
1638  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m.ncols() - 1; j++)
1639  os << std::setw(20) << std::setprecision(16) << m[i][j] << ", ";
1640  os << std::setw(20) << std::setprecision(16) << m[i][m.ncols() - 1] << std::endl;
1641  }
1642 
1643  return os;
1644 }

1646 template <typename T>
1647 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, Matrix<T>& m)
1648 {
1649  int rows, cols;
1650  char comma;
1651  is >> rows >> cols;
1652  m.resize(rows, cols);
1653  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
1654  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < cols; j++)
1655  is >> m[i][j] >> comma;
1656 
1657  return is;
1658 }
1659 
1660 template <typename T>
1661 T sign(const T& v)
1662 {
1663  if (v >= (T)0.0)
1664  return (T)1.0;
1665  else
1666  return (T)-1.0;
1667 }
1668 
1669 template <typename T>
1670 T dist(const T& a, const T& b)
1671 {
1672  T abs_a = (T)fabs(a), abs_b = (T)fabs(b);
1673  if (abs_a > abs_b)
1674  return abs_a * sqrt((T)1.0 + (abs_b / abs_a) * (abs_b / abs_a));
1675  else
1676  return (abs_b == (T)0.0 ? (T)0.0 : abs_b * sqrt((T)1.0 + (abs_a / abs_b) * (abs_a / abs_b)));
1677 }
1678 
1679 template <typename T>
1680 void svd(const Matrix<T>& A, Matrix<T>& U, Vector<T>& W, Matrix<T>& V)
1681 {
1682  int m = A.nrows(), n = A.ncols(), i, j, k, l, jj, nm;
1683  const unsigned int max_its = 30;
1684  bool flag;
1685  Vector<T> rv1(n);
1686  U = A;
1687  W.resize(n);
1688  V.resize(n, n);
1689  T anorm, c, f, g, h, s, scale, x, y, z;
1690  g = scale = anorm = (T)0.0;
1691 
1692  // Householder reduction to bidiagonal form
1693  for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
1694  {
1695  l = i + 1;
1696  rv1[i] = scale * g;
1697  g = s = scale = (T)0.0;
1698  if (i < m)
1699  {
1700  for (k = i; k < m; k++)
1701  scale += fabs(U[k][i]);
1702  if (scale != (T)0.0)
1703  {
1704  for (k = i; k < m; k++)
1705  {
1706  U[k][i] /= scale;
1707  s += U[k][i] * U[k][i];
1708  }
1709  f = U[i][i];
1710  g = -sign(f) * sqrt(s);
1711  h = f * g - s;
1712  U[i][i] = f - g;
1713  for (j = l; j < n; j++)
1714  {
1715  s = (T)0.0;
1716  for (k = i; k < m; k++)
1717  s += U[k][i] * U[k][j];
1718  f = s / h;
1719  for (k = i; k < m; k++)
1720  U[k][j] += f * U[k][i];
1721  }
1722  for (k = i; k < m; k++)
1723  U[k][i] *= scale;
1724  }
1725  }
1726  W[i] = scale * g;
1727  g = s = scale = (T)0.0;
1728  if (i < m && i != n - 1)
1729  {
1730  for (k = l; k < n; k++)
1731  scale += fabs(U[i][k]);
1732  if (scale != (T)0.0)
1733  {
1734  for (k = l; k < n; k++)
1735  {
1736  U[i][k] /= scale;
1737  s += U[i][k] * U[i][k];
1738  }
1739  f = U[i][l];
1740  g = -sign(f) * sqrt(s);
1741  h = f * g - s;
1742  U[i][l] = f - g;
1743  for (k = l; k <n; k++)
1744  rv1[k] = U[i][k] / h;
1745  for (j = l; j < m; j++)
1746  {
1747  s = (T)0.0;
1748  for (k = l; k < n; k++)
1749  s += U[j][k] * U[i][k];
1750  for (k = l; k < n; k++)
1751  U[j][k] += s * rv1[k];
1752  }
1753  for (k = l; k < n; k++)
1754  U[i][k] *= scale;
1755  }
1756  }
1757  anorm = std::max(anorm, fabs(W[i]) + fabs(rv1[i]));
1758  }
1759  // Accumulation of right-hand transformations
1760  for (i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--)
1761  {
1762  if (i < n - 1)
1763  {
1764  if (g != (T)0.0)
1765  {
1766  for (j = l; j < n; j++)
1767  V[j][i] = (U[i][j] / U[i][l]) / g;
1768  for (j = l; j < n; j++)
1769  {
1770  s = (T)0.0;
1771  for (k = l; k < n; k++)
1772  s += U[i][k] * V[k][j];
1773  for (k = l; k < n; k++)
1774  V[k][j] += s * V[k][i];
1775  }
1776  }
1777  for (j = l; j < n; j++)
1778  V[i][j] = V[j][i] = (T)0.0;
1779  }
1780  V[i][i] = (T)1.0;
1781  g = rv1[i];
1782  l = i;
1783  }
1784  // Accumulation of left-hand transformations
1785  for (i = std::min(m, n) - 1; i >= 0; i--)
1786  {
1787  l = i + 1;
1788  g = W[i];
1789  for (j = l; j < n; j++)
1790  U[i][j] = (T)0.0;
1791  if (g != (T)0.0)
1792  {
1793  g = (T)1.0 / g;
1794  for (j = l; j < n; j++)
1795  {
1796  s = (T)0.0;
1797  for (k = l; k < m; k++)
1798  s += U[k][i] * U[k][j];
1799  f = (s / U[i][i]) * g;
1800  for (k = i; k < m; k++)
1801  U[k][j] += f * U[k][i];
1802  }
1803  for (j = i; j < m; j++)
1804  U[j][i] *= g;
1805  }
1806  else
1807  for (j = i; j < m; j++)
1808  U[j][i] = (T)0.0;
1809  U[i][i]++;
1810  }
1811  // Diagonalization of the bidiagonal form: loop over singular values, and over allowed iterations.
1812  for (k = n - 1; k >= 0; k--)
1813  {
1814  for (unsigned int its = 0; its < max_its; its++)
1815  {
1816  flag = true;
1817  for (l = k; l >= 0; l--) // FIXME: in NR it was l >= 1 but there subscripts start from one
1818  { // Test for splitting
1819  nm = l - 1; // Note that rV[0] is always zero
1820  if ((T)(fabs(rv1[l]) + anorm) == anorm)
1821  {
1822  flag = false;
1823  break;
1824  }
1825  if ((T)(fabs(W[nm]) + anorm) == anorm)
1826  break;
1827  }
1828  if (flag)
1829  {
1830  // Cancellation of rv1[l], if l > 0 FIXME: it was l > 1 in NR
1831  c = (T)0.0;
1832  s = (T)1.0;
1833  for (i = l; i <= k; i++)
1834  {
1835  f = s * rv1[i];
1836  rv1[i] *= c;
1837  if ((T)(fabs(f) + anorm) == anorm)
1838  break;
1839  g = W[i];
1840  h = dist(f, g);
1841  W[i] = h;
1842  h = (T)1.0 / h;
1843  c = g * h;
1844  s = -f * h;
1845  for (j = 0; j < m; j++)
1846  {
1847  y = U[j][nm];
1848  z = U[j][i];
1849  U[j][nm] = y * c + z * s;
1850  U[j][i] = z * c - y * s;
1851  }
1852  }
1853  }
1854  z = W[k];
1855  if (l == k)
1856  { // Convergence
1857  if (z < (T)0.0)
1858  { // Singular value is made nonnegative
1859  W[k] = -z;
1860  for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
1861  V[j][k] = -V[j][k];
1862  }
1863  break;
1864  }
1865  if (its == max_its)
1866  throw std::logic_error("Error svd: no convergence in the maximum number of iterations");
1867  x = W[l];
1868  nm = k - 1;
1869  y = W[nm];
1870  g = rv1[nm];
1871  h = rv1[k];
1872  f = ((y - z) * (y + z) + (g - h) * (g + h)) / (2.0 * h * y);
1873  g = dist(f, (T)1.0);
1874  f = ((x - z) * (x + z) + h * ((y / (f + sign(f)*fabs(g))) - h)) / x;
1875  c = s = (T)1.0; // Next QR transformation
1876  for (j = l; j <= nm; j++)
1877  {
1878  i = j + 1;
1879  g = rv1[i];
1880  y = W[i];
1881  h = s * g;
1882  g *= c;
1883  z = dist(f, h);
1884  rv1[j] = z;
1885  c = f / z;
1886  s = h / z;
1887  f = x * c + g * s;
1888  g = g * c - x * s;
1889  h = y * s;
1890  y *= c;
1891  for (jj = 0; jj < n; jj++)
1892  {
1893  x = V[jj][j];
1894  z = V[jj][i];
1895  V[jj][j] = x * c + z * s;
1896  V[jj][i] = z * c - x * s;
1897  }
1898  z = dist(f, h);
1899  W[j] = z;
1900  if (z != 0) // Rotation can be arbitrary if z = 0
1901  {
1902  z = (T)1.0 / z;
1903  c = f * z;
1904  s = h * z;
1905  }
1906  f = c * g + s * y;
1907  x = c * y - s * g;
1908  for (jj = 0; jj < m; jj++)
1909  {
1910  y = U[jj][j];
1911  z = U[jj][i];
1912  U[jj][j] = y * c + z * s;
1913  U[jj][i] = z * c - y * s;
1914  }
1915  }
1916  rv1[l] = (T)0.0;
1917  rv1[k] = f;
1918  W[k] = x;
1919  }
1920  }
1921 }
1922 
1923 template <typename T>
1924 Matrix<T> pinv(const Matrix<T>& A)
1925 {
1926  Matrix<T> U, V, x, tmp(A.ncols(), A.nrows());
1927  Vector<T> W;
1928  CanonicalBaseVector<T> e(0, A.nrows());
1929  svd(A, U, W, V);
1930  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < A.nrows(); i++)
1931  {
1932  e.reset(i);
1933  tmp.setColumn(i, dot_prod(dot_prod(dot_prod(V, Matrix<double>(DIAG, 1.0 / W, 0.0, W.size(), W.size())), t(U)), e));
1934  }
1935 
1936  return tmp;
1937 }
1938 
1939 template <typename T>
1940 int lu(const Matrix<T>& A, Matrix<T>& LU, Vector<unsigned int>& index)
1941 {
1942  if (A.ncols() != A.nrows())
1943  throw std::logic_error("Error in LU decomposition: matrix must be squared");
1944  int i, p, j, k, n = A.ncols(), ex;
1945  T val, tmp;
1946  Vector<T> d(n);
1947  LU = A;
1948  index.resize(n);
1949 
1950  ex = 1;
1951  for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
1952  {
1953  index[i] = i;
1954  val = (T)0.0;
1955  for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
1956  val = std::max(val, (T)fabs(LU[i][j]));
1957  if (val == (T)0.0)
1958  std::logic_error("Error in LU decomposition: matrix was singular");
1959  d[i] = val;
1960  }
1961 
1962  for (k = 0; k < n - 1; k++)
1963  {
1964  p = k;
1965  val = fabs(LU[k][k]) / d[k];
1966  for (i = k + 1; i < n; i++)
1967  {
1968  tmp = fabs(LU[i][k]) / d[i];
1969  if (tmp > val)
1970  {
1971  val = tmp;
1972  p = i;
1973  }
1974  }
1975  if (val == (T)0.0)
1976  std::logic_error("Error in LU decomposition: matrix was singular");
1977  if (p > k)
1978  {
1979  ex = -ex;
1980  std::swap(index[k], index[p]);
1981  std::swap(d[k], d[p]);
1982  for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
1983  std::swap(LU[k][j], LU[p][j]);
1984  }
1985 
1986  for (i = k + 1; i < n; i++)
1987  {
1988  LU[i][k] /= LU[k][k];
1989  for (j = k + 1; j < n; j++)
1990  LU[i][j] -= LU[i][k] * LU[k][j];
1991  }
1992  }
1993  if (LU[n - 1][n - 1] == (T)0.0)
1994  std::logic_error("Error in LU decomposition: matrix was singular");
1995 
1996  return ex;
1997 }
1998 
1999 template <typename T>
2000 Vector<T> lu_solve(const Matrix<T>& LU, const Vector<T>& b, Vector<unsigned int>& index)
2001 {
2002  if (LU.ncols() != LU.nrows())
2003  throw std::logic_error("Error in LU solve: LU matrix should be squared");
2004  unsigned int n = LU.ncols();
2005  if (b.size() != n)
2006  throw std::logic_error("Error in LU solve: b vector must be of the same dimensions of LU matrix");
2007  Vector<T> x((T)0.0, n);
2008  int i, j, p;
2009  T sum;
2010 
2011  p = index[0];
2012  x[0] = b[p];
2013 
2014  for (i = 1; i < n; i++)
2015  {
2016  sum = (T)0.0;
2017  for (j = 0; j < i; j++)
2018  sum += LU[i][j] * x[j];
2019  p = index[i];
2020  x[i] = b[p] - sum;
2021  }
2022  x[n - 1] /= LU[n - 1][n - 1];
2023  for (i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--)
2024  {
2025  sum = (T)0.0;
2026  for (j = i + 1; j < n; j++)
2027  sum += LU[i][j] * x[j];
2028  x[i] = (x[i] - sum) / LU[i][i];
2029  }
2030  return x;
2031 }
2032 
2033 template <typename T>
2034 void lu_solve(const Matrix<T>& LU, Vector<T>& x, const Vector<T>& b, Vector<unsigned int>& index)
2035 {
2036  x = lu_solve(LU, b, index);
2037 }
2038 
2039 template <typename T>
2040 Matrix<T> lu_inverse(const Matrix<T>& A)
2041 {
2042  if (A.ncols() != A.nrows())
2043  throw std::logic_error("Error in LU invert: matrix must be squared");
2044  unsigned int n = A.ncols();
2045  Matrix<T> A1(n, n), LU;
2046  Vector<unsigned int> index;
2047 
2048  lu(A, LU, index);
2049  CanonicalBaseVector<T> e(0, n);
2050  for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; i++)
2051  {
2052  e.reset(i);
2053  A1.setColumn(i, lu_solve(LU, e, index));
2054  }
2055 
2056  return A1;
2057 }
2058 
2059 template <typename T>
2060 T lu_det(const Matrix<T>& A)
2061 {
2062  if (A.ncols() != A.nrows())
2063  throw std::logic_error("Error in LU determinant: matrix must be squared");
2064  unsigned int d;
2065  Matrix<T> LU;
2066  Vector<unsigned int> index;
2067 
2068  d = lu(A, LU, index);
2069 
2070  return d * prod(LU.extractDiag());
2071 }
2072 
2073 template <typename T>
2074 void cholesky(const Matrix<T> A, Matrix<T>& LL)
2075 {
2076  if (A.ncols() != A.nrows())
2077  throw std::logic_error("Error in Cholesky decomposition: matrix must be squared");
2078  int n = A.ncols();
2079  double sum;
2080  LL = A;
2081 
2082  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++)
2083  {
2084  for (unsigned int j = i; j < n; j++)
2085  {
2086  sum = LL[i][j];
2087  for (int k = i - 1; k >= 0; k--)
2088  sum -= LL[i][k] * LL[j][k];
2089  if (i == j)
2090  {
2091  if (sum <= 0.0)
2092  throw std::logic_error("Error in Cholesky decomposition: matrix is not postive definite");
2093  LL[i][i] = sqrt(sum);
2094  }
2095  else
2096  LL[j][i] = sum / LL[i][i];
2097  }
2098  for (unsigned int k = i + 1; k < n; k++)
2099  LL[i][k] = LL[k][i];
2100  }
2101 }
2102 
2103 template <typename T>
2104 Matrix<T> cholesky(const Matrix<T> A)
2105 {
2106  Matrix<T> LL;
2107  cholesky(A, LL);
2108 
2109  return LL;
2110 }
2111 
2112 template <typename T>
2113 Vector<T> cholesky_solve(const Matrix<T>& LL, const Vector<T>& b)
2114 {
2115  if (LL.ncols() != LL.nrows())
2116  throw std::logic_error("Error in Cholesky solve: matrix must be squared");
2117  unsigned int n = LL.ncols();
2118  if (b.size() != n)
2119  throw std::logic_error("Error in Cholesky decomposition: b vector must be of the same dimensions of LU matrix");
2120  Vector<T> x, y;
2121 
2122  /* Solve L * y = b */
2123  forward_elimination(LL, y, b);
2124  /* Solve L^T * x = y */
2125  backward_elimination(LL, x, y);
2126 
2127  return x;
2128 }
2129 
2130 template <typename T>
2131 void cholesky_solve(const Matrix<T>& LL, Vector<T>& x, const Vector<T>& b)
2132 {
2133  x = cholesky_solve(LL, b);
2134 }
2135 
2136 template <typename T>
2137 void forward_elimination(const Matrix<T>& L, Vector<T>& y, const Vector<T> b)
2138 {
2139  if (L.ncols() != L.nrows())
2140  throw std::logic_error("Error in Forward elimination: matrix must be squared (lower triangular)");
2141  if (b.size() != L.nrows())
2142  throw std::logic_error("Error in Forward elimination: b vector must be of the same dimensions of L matrix");
2143  unsigned int n = b.size();
2144  y.resize(n);
2145 
2146  y[0] = b[0] / L[0][0];
2147  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++)
2148  {
2149  y[i] = b[i];
2150  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < i; j++)
2151  y[i] -= L[i][j] * y[j];
2152  y[i] = y[i] / L[i][i];
2153  }
2154 }
2155 
2156 template <typename T>
2157 Vector<T> forward_elimination(const Matrix<T>& L, const Vector<T> b)
2158 {
2159  Vector<T> y;
2160  forward_elimination(L, y, b);
2161 
2162  return y;
2163 }
2164 
2165 template <typename T>
2166 void backward_elimination(const Matrix<T>& U, Vector<T>& x, const Vector<T>& y)
2167 {
2168  if (U.ncols() != U.nrows())
2169  throw std::logic_error("Error in Backward elimination: matrix must be squared (upper triangular)");
2170  if (y.size() != U.nrows())
2171  throw std::logic_error("Error in Backward elimination: b vector must be of the same dimensions of U matrix");
2172  int n = y.size();
2173  x.resize(n);
2174 
2175  x[n - 1] = y[n - 1] / U[n - 1][n - 1];
2176  for (int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--)
2177  {
2178  x[i] = y[i];
2179  for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++)
2180  x[i] -= U[i][j] * x[j];
2181  x[i] = x[i] / U[i][i];
2182  }
2183 }
2184 
2185 template <typename T>
2186 Vector<T> backward_elimination(const Matrix<T>& U, const Vector<T> y)
2187 {
2188  Vector<T> x;
2189  forward_elimination(U, x, y);
2190 
2191  return x;
2192 }

2312 template <typename T>
2313 Vector<T> var(const Matrix<T>& m, bool sample_correction = false)
2314 {
2315  Vector<T> res((T)0, m.ncols());
2316  unsigned int n = m.nrows();
2317  double sum, ssum;
2318  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m.ncols(); j++)
2319  {
2320  sum = (T)0.0; ssum = (T)0.0;
2321  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m.nrows(); i++)
2322  {
2323  sum += m[i][j];
2324  ssum += (m[i][j] * m[i][j]);
2325  }
2326  if (!sample_correction)
2327  res[j] = (ssum / n) - (sum / n) * (sum / n);
2328  else
2329  res[j] = n * ((ssum / n) - (sum / n) * (sum / n)) / (n - 1);
2330  }
2331 
2332  return res;
2333 }
2334

2337 {
2338  return vec_sqrt(var(m, sample_correction));

2342 Vector<T> r_var(const Matrix<T>& m, bool sample_correction = false)
2343 {

2345  double sum, ssum;
2346  unsigned int n = m.ncols();

2348  {
2349  sum = 0.0; ssum = 0.0;
2350  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m.ncols(); j++)
2351  {
2352  sum += m[i][j];
2353  ssum += (m[i][j] * m[i][j]);
2354  }
2355  if (!sample_correction)
2356  res[i] = (ssum / n) - (sum / n) * (sum / n);
2357  else
2358  res[i] = n * ((ssum / n) - (sum / n) * (sum / n)) / (n - 1);
2359  }
2360 
2361  return res;
2362 }
